name: paymentInformation

testSteps.description: Given that I'm logged into 'Voucher Entry Review' page

children.description: When i open page from sidebar menu: {Accounts Payable,Review A/P Entries,Voucher Entries}

testSteps.description: Then the 'Voucher Entry Review' page and its contents should show up
When I set the 'Supplier' to '118173'
When I click on 'Show Posted Batches' checkbox
When I click on 'Search' button
Then the 'Review Voucher' search result should show up
When I select the first voucher entry with paid status
When i click on payment information button of the first voucher entry

exception.message:

testSteps.description: Then the payment information modal should show up
Then the document number from the payment information modal should show up
Then the document type from the payment information modal should show up
Then the payment type from the payment information modal should show up
Then the payment number from the payment information modal should show up
Then the payment date from the payment information modal should show up
Then the payment amount from the payment information modal should show up
Then the discount taken from the payment information modal should show up
Then the currency code from the payment information modal should show up
Then the exchange rate from the payment information modal should show up
Then the payment amount CHF from the payment information modal should show up
Then the discount taken CHF from the payment information modal should show up
When i close the modal

title: Payment information
